text: The first Variant Under Investigation in December 2020 (VUI â€“ 202012/01), also known as B.1.1.7, is a mutation of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19. It was first detected in the United Kingdom in October 2020, and it quickly began to spread by mid-December. Scientists know that this variant can transmit faster than other SARS-CoV-2 variants. ==Notes== ==References == Category:COVID-19 pandemic Category:October 2020 events Category:November 2020 events Category:December 2020 events
title: Variant of Concern 202012/01
